00031 CanaryWithPrior::CanaryWithPrior(CanaryOptions& opts, 
00032                                  valarray<double> & vals_in,
00033                                  CanaryPrior & prior_in)
00034   : _opts(opts)
00035   {
00036   _vals.resize(vals_in.size()); _vals = vals_in;
00037   _prior = prior_in;
00038   valarray<double>vars = _prior.var();
00039   for (int k=0; k<vars.size(); k++)
00040     if (vars[k] < _opts.tune_min_cluster_variance)
00041       vars[k] = _opts.tune_min_cluster_variance;
00042   _prior.var(vars);
00043 
00044   if ((prior_in.prop(0) + prior_in.prop(1)) == 0.0)
00045     {
00046     _canary_model.erase("model0");
00047         _canary_model.erase("model01");
00048         _canary_model.erase("model12");
00049         _canary_model.erase("model012");
00050         _canary_model.erase("model123");
00051         _canary_model.erase("model0123");
00052         _canary_model.erase("model1234");
00053         _canary_model.erase("model01234");
00054         }
00055 
00056   if ((prior_in.prop(3) + prior_in.prop(4)) == 0.0)
00057     {
00058     _canary_model.erase("model23");
00059         _canary_model.erase("model34");
00060         _canary_model.erase("model234");
00061         _canary_model.erase("model123");
00062         _canary_model.erase("model0123");
00063         _canary_model.erase("model1234");
00064         _canary_model.erase("model01234");
00065         }
00066 
00067 //  leave these print statements in for future debugging 
00068 //  printf("\n");
00069 //  printf("model      loglik  bic     close     over   af   hwe                  fit\n");
00070   for (unsigned long k=0; k<_canary_model.size(); k++)
00071     {
00072     string model_name = _canary_model(k);
00073     vector<int>cvec = _canary_model[model_name];
00074     BroadEstepper1 BE = gmm_withprior(_vals,cvec);
00075     BE_map.insert(std::pair<std::string,BroadEstepper1>(model_name,BE));
00076 
00077     CanaryPenalty CP = assay_fit(BE,cvec);
00078 //      printf("%-8s %8.1f %5.1f %8.1f %8.1f %5.3f %20.17f %7.1f\n",
00079 //              model_name.c_str(), CP.loglikelihood(), CP.bic(), CP.closeness(),
00080 //              CP.overlap(), CP.af(), CP.hwe(), CP.fit());
00081         
00082     CP_map[model_name] = CP;
00083     } 
00084 //  printf("\n");
00085 //  printf("\n");
00086   fflush(stdout);
00087   }
00088 
00089 string CanaryWithPrior::best_fit()
00090   {
00091   vector<pair<string,double> >fits;
00092 
00093   for (unsigned int k=0; k<_canary_model.size(); k++)
00094     {
00095     string model = _canary_model(k);
00096     double fit = CP_map[model].fit();
00097     fits.push_back(pair<string,double>(model,fit));
00098     }
00099 
00100   string best_model = fits[0].first;
00101   double best_fit = fits[0].second;
00102 
00103   for (unsigned int k=1; k<fits.size(); k++)
00104     {
00105     if (fits[k].second > best_fit)
00106       {
00107       best_model=fits[k].first;
00108       best_fit=fits[k].second;
00109       }
00110     }
00111 
00112   return best_model;
00113   }

00116 
00117 BroadEstepper1 CanaryWithPrior::gmm_withprior(valarray<double> vals,
00118       vector<int> cluster_vec)
00119   {
00120   int MIN_ITER = 10;
00121   int MAX_ITER = 100;
00122   double LOGLIK_THRESHOLD = 0.01;
00123 
00124   BroadEstepper1 BE(_opts,vals,_prior,cluster_vec);
00125 
00126   double old_loglik=0.0;
00127   int iterations = 0;
00128   while(1)
00129     {
00130     iterations++;
00131     double loglik = BE.log_likelihood();
00132 
00133     BE.update_broad();
00134 
00135     double delta_loglik = fabs(loglik - old_loglik);
00136     old_loglik = loglik;
00137         
00138 
00139     if (iterations < MIN_ITER) continue;
00140     if (iterations == MAX_ITER) break;
00141     if (delta_loglik < LOGLIK_THRESHOLD) break;
00142     }
00143 
00144   return BE;
00145   }
00146 
00147 
00148 CanaryPenalty CanaryWithPrior::assay_fit(BroadEstepper1 BE,
00149                                          vector<int> cluster_vec)
00150   {
00151   unsigned long N = BE.vals().size();
00152   unsigned long G = cluster_vec.size();
00153 
00154   double loglik = BE.log_likelihood();
00155   double bic = 2.0*loglik - G*log((double)N);
00156   double reward_closeness=0.0;
00157 
00158   for (unsigned int k=0; k<G; k++)
00159     {
00160     double closeness = abs(BE.mean(k) - _prior.mean(cluster_vec[k]));
00161     if (closeness < _opts.tune_TOL) closeness = _opts.tune_TOL;
00162     reward_closeness += BE.prop(k)/closeness;
00163     }
00164 
00165 
00166   // OPTIONS
00167   reward_closeness *= 0.1*G*abs(bic);
00168 
00169   valarray<double>frequencies = BE.prop();
00170   valarray<double>delta_frequencies = _prior.prop();
00171 
00172   for (unsigned int k=0; k<G; k++)
00173     delta_frequencies[cluster_vec[k]] -= frequencies[k];
00174 
00175   double af = _opts.tune_af_weight*(delta_frequencies*delta_frequencies).sum();
00176 
00177   double hwe = hardy_weinberg(BE.cvec(),(double)BE.vals().size()*BE.prop());
00178 
00179   double hwe_penalty=0.0;
00180   if (hwe < _opts.tune_hwe_tol) hwe_penalty = -log10(hwe);
00181   if (hwe < _opts.tune_hwe_tol2) hwe_penalty = -50*log10(hwe);
00182 
00183   double overlap = InterferenceModel(_opts,BE.mean(),BE.var()).interference();
00184   overlap *= 1000;
00185 
00186   double fit = 5.0*bic - abs(af*bic);
00187   fit +=  reward_closeness/(overlap + af + 1);
00188   fit -= overlap + 30*hwe_penalty;
00189 
00190   return CanaryPenalty(loglik,bic,reward_closeness,af,fit,hwe,overlap);
00191   }
